weight: Approximately 4.48 oz. (excluding battery and bundled accessories)
recordingmedia: 18.6MB built-in flash memory, SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, MMC (Multimedia Card), MMC plus (Multimedia Card plus) compatible
flashmode: Auto, Flash off, Flash on, Soft Flash, Red eye reduction
zoomratio: 3 x optical zoom, 4x digital zoom (12 times both with optical and digital zoom) HD Zoom Maximum 15.1x (@VGA, both with optical and digital zoom)
dimensions: 3.64″ (W) x 2.17″ (H) x .91″ (D) (excluding projections; .80″ at thinnest point)
playbackfunctions: Playback Zoom (8X), 12-image Screen, Start-up Images, Rotate, Re-size, Trimming, Copy, BGM Slideshow
speaker: Monaural
aperture: F2.8(W) – F5.6(W) (ND filter is being used.) (Using optical zoom causes the aperture to change.)
flashrange: Normal: Approx. .49′-9.19′ (W) Approx. 1.31′-4.92′ (T) * Range is affected by optical zoom.
shutterspeed: Auto : 1/2 – 1/2000 second Night Scene : 4 – 1/2000 second (Depending on user’s setting of Camera）
lensfocallength: F2.8(W) – F5.2(T) / f=6.2 – 18.6mm (Approx. 37.5 – 112.5mm equivalent to 35mm film) 6 lenses in 5 groups, including aspherical lens.
timekeepingfunctions: Built-in quartz digital clock Date and Time: Recorded with image data With time stamp function Auto Calendar: To 2049
shuttertype: CCD electronic shutter and mechanical shutter
imagesensor: 1/2.5-inch square pixel CCD Total Pixels: 8.29 megapixels
whitebalance: Auto WB, Daylight, Overcast, Shade, Day white Fluorescent, Daylight Fluorescent, Tungsten, manual WB Sensitivity
focusmode: Auto Focus, Macro Mode, Pan Focus, Infinity mode, Manual focus
recordingfunctions: Snapshot, Marco, Self-timer, Continuous shooting(Normal Speed CS), BEST SHOT, Face Detection, Movie(Normal Movie, For YouTube), Voice Recording * Audio recording is monaural
fileformat: Still images: JPEG (Exif Ver. 2.2, DCF1.0, DPOF) Movies: Motion JPEG, AVI format, IMA-ADPCM (monaural) Audio (Voice Recording): WAV format (monaural)
